mapper.update: update meeting_room_revervation set mr_reservation_status = 'F' where to_date(mr_reservation_date, 'YY/MM/DD') < sysdate and user_no = #{ userNo }
mapper.select: select mr_code , mr_name , mr_place from meeting_room where mr_status = 'Y' and com_no = #{comNo}

select mr_reservation_no , mr_code , mr_name , mr_reservation_date , mr_start_time , mr_end_time , mr_use , mr_reservation_status from meeting_room_revervation join meeting_room using (mr_code) where user_no = #{userNo} and com_no = #{comNo} and mr_reservation_status in ('R', 'F')

select mr_reservation_no , mr_code , mr_name , mr_reservation_date , mr_start_time , mr_end_time , mr_use , mr_reservation_status , mr_place from meeting_room_revervation join meeting_room using (mr_code) where mr_reservation_no = #{reserveNo}
mapper.insert: insert into meeting_room_revervation ( mr_reservation_no , user_no , mr_code , mr_reservation_date , mr_start_time , mr_end_time , mr_use ) values ( SEQ_MEETING_ROOM_REVERVATION.NEXTVAL , #{loginUser.userNo} , #{mr.mrCode} , #{mr.mrReservationDate} , #{mr.mrStartTime} || ':00' , #{mr.mrEndTime} || ':00' , #{mr.mrUse} )
mapper.update: update meeting_room_revervation set mr_reservation_status = 'C' where mr_reservation_no = #{mrReservationNo}
